recipe.title: 4-Ingredient Gluten-Free Dough Biscuits Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups ; gluten-free flour blend, plus more for flouring ; (250 g)

steps.step: In a large bowl, mix together the yogurt, gluten-free flour blend, baking powder, and salt until a dough forms.
Transfer the dough to a lightly-floured surface and flatten into a 12-inch (30-cm) disk.
Use a small cookie cutter to punch out 12 biscuit rounds.
Transfer the rounds to a parchment-lined baking sheet.
Use a pastry brush to brush the butter on the biscuits and lightly sprinkle the tops with salt.
Bake for 15 minutes, until the biscuits are set and just starting to brown.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a large bowl, mix together the yogurt, gluten-free flour blend, baking powder, and salt until a dough forms.
Transfer the dough to a lightly-floured surface and flatten into a 12-inch (30-cm) disk.
Use a small cookie cutter to punch out 12 biscuit rounds.
Transfer the rounds to a parchment-lined baking sheet.
Use a pastry brush to brush the butter on the biscuits and lightly sprinkle the tops with salt.
Bake for 15 minutes, until the biscuits are set and just starting to brown.
